useCase.name: Display Inventory List
useCase.description: As a Manager, I want to view the inventory list through the Management Interface, so that I can manage the available products effectively.

mainSequence.step: Manager requests the inventory list through the Management Interface
Management Interface activates and retrieves the inventory data from the Inventory Management Module
Inventory Management Module queries the inventory list from the Database
Database sends back the response containing the inventory list data to Inventory Management Module
Inventory Management Module returns the inventory list data to the Management Interface
Management Interface displays the inventory list to the Manager
